# usesBottomSafeArea

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the layout guide uses the view’s safe area layout guide.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var usesBottomSafeArea: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Defaults to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], indicating that the layout guide ties to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UILayoutGuide/bottomAnchor] of the view’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/safeAreaLayoutGuide].

Set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] to tie the layout guide to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/bottomAnchor] of the view instead.
